data.title: Rural Houses in Cangas de Onís (Asturias)
data.meta_description: If you need :nombre, we are definitely your best option. We manage your reservation so you only have to think about enjoying yourself.
data.text:
Ancient capital of the Kingdom of Asturias, the rural houses of Cangas de Onís bring together all the charm of this land surrounded by nature, culture and a multitude of activities so that visitors can find everything they need in a holiday getaway. Rest and feel the relaxation, while you discover emblematic points of this council like its Roman Bridge and the Royal Site of Covadonga with the National Park of the Picos de Europa as witness of this adventure. A green and historic paradise now at your fingertips.

With the reservation of a rural house in the council of Cangas de Onís the visitor has the perfect opportunity to enter one of the most beautiful villages of the Principality of Asturias. Bordered by forests, mountains and the waters of the River Sella, your visit will allow you to discover one of the most preferred rural tourism destinations in Spain and is that its attractions are multiple.

When you rent a cangués rural accommodation you will not only have a house where you can feel the maximum comfort. Its strategic location allows tourists to visit charming towns such as Parres, Ribadesella, Llanes or Amieva and their main points of interest, while submerging in that paradise painted green that Asturias shares with the world to amaze us.

The best rural houses of Cangas de Onís in Ruralia

Here you will find a complete and careful selection of rural houses in Cangas de Onís with the best equipment. In addition, your stay will make this getaway a complete experience where nature, culture and outdoor activities go hand in hand so that you always carry Asturias in your heart.

Comfortable inside and beautiful outside, the rural tourism accommodation in this Asturian village has everything you need to spend a comfortable and relaxing stay. We pamper the selection of these rural houses so that they combine a wide variety of services, the comfort so that you feel like in your house and the sign of identity of the traditional constructions of the zone. All this together with a privileged environment add reasons to check availability and book online one of the best cottages in Cangas de Onis at the best price.

You will enjoy without looking at the clock, you will know historical monuments of obligatory visit like the Roman Bridge with the Cross of the Victory, you will discover the solemnity of the Church of Santa Maria or the beautiful Palacete of Enrique Monasterio. Would you like to get lost in full nature and visit the Lakes of Covadonga? They are very close to the rural house you rent in Cangas de Onís, so make the most of the occasion and get involved in the landscape of the Natural Park of the Picos de Europa!

In addition, for nature lovers, booking a rural tourism house in the heart of the canguese paradise will take you on hiking trails and many other outdoor activities that will multiply the grandeur of this getaway.

Are these cottages the cheapest in Cangas de Onís?

In Ruralia we only offer the best offers in rural tourism accommodation in Asturias, for any season of the year.

With excellent prices, we recommend you to analyze with tranquility the characteristics of each rural house located in Cangas de Onis and surroundings to compare prices and equipment.

Remember that, given their capacity, you will be able to go with your partner, with friends or family, and even with your pet since there are canguesas rural houses with access for dogs. Everything is ready for you to enjoy!

Discover Cangas de Onís with Ruralia. It will captivate you!
